name: dots ν | Flipper
description:
Welcome to "dots ν nu | Flipper".

It's a new, free and addictive game for someone who is patient and wants to climbup on the LeaderBoard.

How to play:
Tap the screen at the right moment when the ball is about to get out.

Includes:
- Battle your friends score with Game Center.
- Free download (with in app purchase for removing ads).

Powered by WC Games:
http://wc-games.com

Developed by OdiusFly Studio:
http://odiusfly.com

Graphics by MadPixel:
http://madpixel.gr
